title: Fonts
content:
The font-weight property will adjust which of the following?

How thin or thick text appears.




### Single Word Values

```js
  font-family: Arial;
```



### Multi Word Values

```js
  font-family: 'Times New Roman';
```


### Fallback Fonts

Separate by commas1

```js
   font-family: Caslon, Georgia, 'Times New Roman';
```

![](image-l0sxovrn.png)
